text.p:
This common order will govern the captioned main writ petition and
captioned WMP thereat. A public Wakf, which goes by the name
'Sunnathval Jamath Pallivasal, Kanni Beevi Dharka and Mamana Radha
Dharka' [hereinafter 'said Wakf' for the sake of convenience and clarity] is
the nucleus of the captioned writ petition and removal of committee of
administration qua said Wakf is the central theme of the captioned writ
petition.

2. Captioned writ petition was filed in 2017, to be precise on
15.02.2017 and the prayer is to remove the fifth respondent from the
management of said Wakf.

3. The case of the writ petitioner is that he is a member of the Jamath
with voting rights qua said Wakf but it is not necessary to delve into these
aspects of the matter and it is not necessary to dilate further on these aspects
of the case on hand as the trajectory the captioned writ petition has taken
and the central theme in the captioned writ petition make it unnecessary.

4. This court is informed without any disputation or disagreement that
pending writ petition, Tamil Nadu Wakf Board held elections for the
committee of administration qua said Wakf on 21.07.2019 and 9 individuals
were elected.

5. Mr. Nihar Ali, learned counsel representing the counsel on record
for the writ petitioner, Mr. S.A. Ajmal Khan, learned Standing Counsel for
Tamil Nadu Wakf Board on behalf of respondents 1 to 3 and Mr.
Hemakarthikeyan, learned counsel on record for respondents 4 and 5 are
before me.

6. All the aforementioned counsel submit in one voice that there is no
disputation or disagreement about elections having been held on 21.07.2019
qua said wakf. All the counsel also submit that of the nine individuals
elected to the committee of administration 5 th respondent did not get elected
but the writ petitioner got elected. This court is also informed that the
tenure of the elected committee of administration is three years i.e, from
21.07.2019 to 20.07.2022 and the committee is now in office.

7. Learned Standing counsel for Tamil Nadu Wakf Board has placed
before me proceedings regarding the elected 9 Member Committee of
administration being put in place and a scanned reproduction of the same is
as follows:

8. All the aforementioned counsel further submit without any
disputation that the above draws the curtains on the captioned main writ
petition. Captioned main writ petition is disposed of as closed. Though
obvious it is made clear that I have not expressed any view or opinion on
the merits of the matter. Consequently, captioned MP is also disposed of as
closed. There shall be no order as to costs.
